indications: Indications bacterial skin infections (see also notes above)
name: MUPIROCIN
side-effects:
Side-effects local reactions including urticaria, pruritus,
burning sensation, rash
doses:
adult and child over 1 year, apply up to 3 times daily for
up to 10 days; child under 1 year see BNF for Children
pregnancy:
Pregnancy manufacturer advises avoid unless potential benefit
outweighs risk—no information available
